title: PvP.net lag?
body: After game just now my partner and I couldn't receive end game stats, we had connection errors come up. After this we had buggy slow clients so we restarted, logging in again took about 40 seconds to connect, usually it is almost instant. Trying to create a game lobby and testing if queue would work was very slow. My partner lives in Melbourne, while I live near Perth, so we don't believe it's ISP.
